translations: v．设立警戒线，封锁：在某个区域周围设置警戒线，以限制或控制人员进出。
· The police cordoned off the area after the explosion.
爆炸后，警方封锁了该区域。

sentences.sentence: Police cordoned off part of the city centre.
sentences.translation: 警察封锁了市中心的部分地区。

sentences.sentence: Police cordoned off the area until the bomb was made safe.
sentences.translation: 警方封锁了这个地区直到炸弹被安全拆除为止。
